Anyway, the plane goes off the runway and we hit the sand with a hell of a jolt and the right wing tip digs into the sand and the plane skids around in a circle!
They think this is the way you stop an airplane.
You stick one wing in the sand and you spin around until you stop.
What do they know? They never rode in an airplane. They think this is how you do it!
Replies.Didascalie: (CONT'D) (coughing as he laughs harder and harder)

Bonds.
Well, the only bonds I know about are bail bonds.

How much did you make last year?
It's over! He's coming out!   Let's go! Let's go!

No bail! No bail! Lock him up!
Yeah! Yeah! Tell him! Tell him!
No bail!   Put him in jail!
Murderer! Motherfucker! -- Say your prayers, Park Avenue -- Tear you a new one -- You mine, needlenose! -- Count every breath, baby!
Fruit flies. That's all they are.
Is he choking? Let me give him the Heimlich maneuver.
Yes. But they always come back to the shit. Don't they?
Sherman, has anybody talked to you about television?
